snippet: Robert A. Durst, who had checked into a JW Marriott in New Orleans under an alias, agreed to be taken to Los Angeles to face a murder charge in the killing of Susan Berman in 2000.
abstract: Robert A Durst, during arraignment in New Orleans, agrees to be taken to Los Angeles to face murder charges in killing of Susan Berman in 2000; had apparently confessed to this and two other killings while being interviewed for HBO documentary The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst.

byline.original: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON, MARC SANTORA and CHARLES V. BAGLI
byline.contributor: Campbell Robertson reported from New Orleans, and Marc Santora and Charles V. Bagli from New York. Bruce Fretts contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Robert A. Durst, who had checked into a JW Marriott in New Orleans under an alias, agreed to be taken to Los Angeles to face a murder charge in the killing of Susan Berman in 2000.
